HL7 FHIR® UK Core Implementation Guide - December 2019. Based on FHIR Version 4.0.1
Note: this is an initial prototype specification.

Profiles

This page lists all the Profiles that have been defined for this Implementation Guide.

  • UK Core AllergyIntolerance Defines the UK Core constraints and extensions on the AllergyIntolerance resource for the minimal set of data to query and retrieve allergy information.
  • UK Core Condition Defines the UK Core constraints and extensions on the Condition resource for the minimal set of data to query and retrieve problems and health concerns information.
  • UK Core Consent Defines the UK Core constraints and extensions on the Consent resource for the minimal set of data to query and retrieve consent information.
  • UK Core Encounter Defines the UK Core constraints and extensions on the Encounter resource for the minimal set of data to query and retrieve encounter information.
  • UK Core List Defines the UK Core constraints and extensions on the List resource for the minimal set of data to query and retrieve a list of information.
  • UK Core Location Defines the UK Core constraints and extensions on the Location resource for the minimal set of data to query and retrieve location information.
  • UK Core Observation Defines the UK Core constraints and extensions on the observation resource for the minimal set of data to query and retrieve generic observation information.
  • UK Core Organization Defines the UK Core constraints and extensions on the Organization resource for the minimal set of data to query and retrieve organisation information.
  • UK Core Patient Defines the UK Core constraints and extensions on the Patient resource for the minimal set of data to query and retrieve an individual’s demographic information.
  • UK Core Practitioner Defines the UK Core constraints and extensions on the Practitioner resource for the minimal set of data to query and retrieve practitioner information.
  • UK Core PractitionerRole Defines the UK Core constraints and extensions on the PractitionerRole resource for the minimal set of data to query and retrieve practitioner role information.
  • UK Core Procedure Defines the UK Core constraints and extensions on the Procedure resource for the minimal set of data to query and retrieve the patient’s procedure information.
  • UK Core RelatedPerson Defines the UK Core constraints and extensions on the RelatedPerson resource for the minimal set of data to query and retrieve related person information.

    • Published by NHS Digital nhsdigital.fhir.r4.core.prototype# based on FHIR 4.0.1 created 2019-12-18.
